data.title: Nia Long
data.meta_description: Nia Long (born October 30, 1970) is an American actress and occasional music video director. She is best known for her roles in the television series The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air and Third Watch, and the films Soul Food, Love Jones, The Best Man, Big Momma's House, and Are We There Yet?     Long was born in Brooklyn, New York, U.S. Her family is of Afro-Trinidadian descent.
